# grantory_register (Data Source)
Use this data source to filter Grantory records inside a Terraform/OpenTofu plan.


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `register_id` (String) Identifier of the register entry to fetch.

### Optional

- `labels` (Map of String) Labels associated with the register entry.
- `payload` (String) JSON-encoded payload that describes the registered item.

### Read-Only

- `host_id` (String) Host identifier that owns the register entry.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
